name: C:\ANNIHILATE
description:
Welcome to the future of 2X01.

Half the world's population has been reduced to dust after the "Nuclear ANNHILATION" event of 2432 and the other half have become technology addicted ghouls. Those who still have agency have huddled together in the glowing ruins of once functioning societies. 
With the supply of things like food, water, and body augmentations always running low, these new-world societies now have to rely on Runners, dangerous mercenaries who go out into the blasted wastelands and scavenge for supplies while fending off threats such as, bandits, mutants, and tech-addled zombies. 

In C:\ANNIHILATE you take on the role of one of these fearless Runners as you shoot, jump, and blast your way through fiends and computers alike. There are three levels to shoot through and your time is recorded at the end. 

CONTROLS:

WASD: Move
MOUSE: Aim + Shoot (click)
MOUSEWHEEL: change weapons
R: Reload
SHIFT: Sprint
SPACE: Jump
ESC: Quit Game

This game was created for LOWREZ Jam 2021. I had a ton of fun making it and I hope you have atleast 1/4th the fun playing it! 

Post your completion time down below in the comments below!
